name: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
desc: Window collection behaviors related to Exposé and Spaces.

items.name: static var canJoinAllSpaces: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window appears in all spaces.

items.name: static var moveToActiveSpace: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: When the window becomes active, move it to the active space instead of switching spaces.

items.name: static var managed: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window participates in Spaces and Exposé.

items.name: static var transient: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window floats in Spaces and hides in Exposé.

items.name: static var stationary: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: Exposé doesn’t affect the window, so it stays visible and stationary, like the desktop window.

items.name: static var participatesInCycle: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window participates in the window cycle for use with the Cycle Through Windows menu item.

items.name: static var ignoresCycle: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window isn’t part of the window cycle for use with the Cycle Through Windows menu item.

items.name: static var fullScreenPrimary: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window can enter full-screen mode.

items.name: static var fullScreenAuxiliary: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window can display on the same space as the full-screen window.

items.name: static var fullScreenNone: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window doesn’t support full-screen mode.

items.name: static var fullScreenAllowsTiling: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window can be a secondary full screen tile even if it can’t be a full screen window itself.

items.name: static var fullScreenDisallowsTiling: NSWindow.CollectionBehavior
items.desc: The window doesn’t support being a full-screen tile window, but may support being a full-screen window.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a window collection behavior using the given raw value.
